part1_list: Bizplus Corporation (hereinafter referred to as our company) recognizes the importance of all personal information handled in the business as an information service industry, and tackles the operation of the personal information protection management system trusted by the customer。

In order to handle the personal information and personal information received from our customers in accordance with the activities of the business, we shall provide the following guidelines: personal information protection policy. We will make this policy well known to the staff (hereinafter referred to as employees) and endeavor to protect appropriate personal information。

1. In order to obtain and manage personal information, we establish a management system to protect personal information in accordance with our business activities, establish internal rules regarding acquisition, use and provision of appropriate personal information within the scope of which consent is obtained, and comply with this and do not use outside use.

2. Compliance with laws, guidelines and standards concerning personal information, compliance with the laws and regulations concerning handling of personal information, national guidelines, industry guidelines and other standards.
3. When an unexpected risk occurs in personal information, corrective action is promptly performed.
4. Regarding the response to complaints and consultations, we will clarify the procedure and respond appropriately to complaints and consultation from customers and employees.

5. Education and training of personal information protection will understand the importance of personal information protection and ensure that the personal information protection policy will be permeated to the entire company, and the necessary education, enlightenment and auditing will be carried out in order to treat the individual information appropriately.
6. Improvement of the management system of the social security system.
security.part2_title: Handling of personal information in employment

part2_list.val: Purpose and scope of collection of personal information

Our company will collect applicant's personal information in the necessary range for the adoption of the employee and use it in in the range of the employment business of the company  (Application qualification, adoption permission judgment, communication, etc.). If you do not wish to provide personal information, Under this situation it is possible to affcet the Admission result. Please understand.

Our company do not provide or disclose personal information to any third party except in the following cases.
(1)In the case where the principal has been agreed
(2)In the case where it is necessary to preserve the gross interests of life and health and property of the person and the public
(3)Cases based on laws and regulations

Our company may conquer all or part of the handling of personal information for the purpose of the collection use purpose. Our company are responsible for the assessment and management of the information and the handling of personal information.

(1)In order to prevent personal information leakage, loss, falsification, and illegal access, Our company will continue to take necessary and appropriate safety management measures to protect personal information.
(2)The application form of the person who is adopted as a result of the consideration is handled as personnel management data (personal information in the office) after entering the company. After the selection of the application document of the person who became the non adoption, it is discharged with responsibility.<

When the person is requested to disclose the personal information of the applicant who is acquired and possessed by the company, it is confirmed that it is the person himself, and it responds without delay. For these specific request procedures, please contact the following inquiries. The application form is sent by mail or fax.

list.title: The purpose of company education
dlist: From compliance measures, enhancing sales force, becoming an attractive company, improving business performance, improving productivity, etc., our company is conducting education and training for the purpose of human resource development, such as improvement and motivation of employees

list.title: Business Manner
dlist: Learning business manner not only  make the other person comfortable, but also a weapon to make your work more advantageous
There are a wide variety of basic manners such as greetings and bows, and how to pass business cards that are required for business.
Business manners are like lubricants for communication and are the first step to connect with people.
In business manner education, our company will teach in an easy-understand way about common manner sense and points related to manners which are useful in actual business situations.

list.title: Communication Skill
dlist: There are so many people talking about [Not good at communication], now the communication skill is required

Sentence is easier than language.[how to say the word] is more important than [what you want to say].That’s what we call The Communication. For that reason,[communicate],[listen],[inquire] is important.

Expression,tone of sound,behavior and so on.In one sentence, the language affects people 1 piont but bodylanguage affect 9 pionts.Bodylanguage,build trust relationship,get to know each other,this section accounts for a large proportion.Even in workplace,methods and communication are easier to learn.

list.title: Habits of Japan,Manners of Japan
dlist: Japanese culture has many common rules,even in traditional situation.It just like talking to your neighbors, clients and guests and politicians and other socical situations.Begin with the questions of daliy lifes and topics.Discuss with each other when communicating with people from other countries.
After you understand the Japanese manners, life and work will goes better and it’s better to understand each other.

news_list.title: プログラミング勉強会
desc_list: まずは参加者全員でボードゲームをプレイして、次にそれをプログラムで書いてみようというテーマでプログラミングの学習を行っています。
プログラムに書き起こすためには、ゲームのルールを理解して、それを論理的に組み上げる必要があります。
使用する言語は、自由に選択でき、業務で使う言語や興味のある言語でプログラムを作っています。
また、同時にアジャイル開発思考も取り入れて柔軟なプログラミングを学んでいます。

news_list.title: The 3rd Employee Travel
desc_list: I went on an employee trip for two days a night as a early-year-end party. Healed by capybara soaked in a hot spring bath at Izu Shaboten Animal Park, climbed Mt. I was blessed with a great deal of fatigue.
I'm going to try again next year ((')`))
The first prize of the Bingo tournament was Dyson's Cyclone vacuum cleaner

news_list.title: The 2nd Employee Travel
desc_list: I went on a trip for 3 days and 2 nights to invite our employees and related people.
The first day went to Itoman in Okinawa, the second day was Okinawa Churaumi I went to the aquarium and enjoyed swimming on the third day.
I would like to establish it as an annual event once a year.

news_list.title: The first Time Employee Travel
desc_list: We went out for a 2-day trip to our company and our associates.
The first day is Karuizawa-Ueda-Manza area, the second day is Kusatsu Onsen- I went out to the area of ​​Numata.
I would like to be established as an annual event once a year.

news_list.title: First annual company year-end party
desc_list: On the 23rd, Bizplus employees and related parties were called to hold a year-end party.
You are a young company that has been established for less than a year, but many people have participated. It was a lively gathering.
I was very thankful for this year and I hope to see you again next year with Bizplus.

careers.careers_title: We are looking for a person who is positive and growing ambitious.
title_list: Our company was just founded in 2015.
The average age of the employees is 30 years old, characterized by a large number of young people.
If you give it a try, it's an immature company.
That's why growth is an environment where you can challenge anything if you are motivated.
We are looking for people who have ambitions and who can grow together while having fun, who will be able to feel the potential like that.
We look forward to hearing from you
